description: Daily Police Incidents, which is updated every day at 11AM, provided by City of Raleigh Police Department.  Column Heading = Code of Incident Type LCR DESC Column Heading = Description of Incident Type

metadata.description:
This dataset only includes Police Incidents reported from the previous calendar day, which is updated every day at 11AM, provided by City of Raleigh Police Department.  Column Heading = Code of Incident Type LCR DESC Column Heading = Description of Incident Type

For the full dataset of all Police Incidents since 2005: https://data.raleighnc.gov/Police/Police-Incident-Data-All-Dates-Master-File/csw9-dd5k

name: Daily Police Incidents
